w:r.w:t: Strategic and results-driven IT leader with 16+ years of experience in designing, deploying, and managing secure, scalable, and high-availability infrastructure across finance, telecommunications, and humanitarian sectors. Proven track record of leading multi-country IT operations, implementing cloud-first strategies (AWS & Azure), fortifying cybersecurity posture, and optimizing enterprise networks and customer platforms. Adept at aligning technology vision with business outcomes while managing large teams, complex budgets, and mission-critical vendor relationships.

Vendor & Contract Management (ISPs, MNOs, SaaS, Licensing)
People Leadership (Team Building, Career Pathing, Mentorship)
